subject: Programming
title: Why Computers Use Binary
description: Learn Why Computers Use Binary in one minute.

hook.text: Humans use ten digits. Computers only use two: zero and one.

buildup.text: Electricity has two reliable states: on and off. Binary maps perfectly to that physical reality.

discovery.text: Every photo, song, and app is encoded as a massive sequence of ones and zeros.

twist.text: Early computers tried using ten states per wire. The error rates were catastrophic.

climax.text: Two states are easy to distinguish. Ten states blur together. Simplicity won.

punchline.text: Two digits do everything because electricity is binary.
